heading: Bosnian language.
general-note: Here are entered works on the language of the Bosnians treated as a separate language. Works on the language(s) of the Serbs or Croats treated as separate languages are entered under. Serbian language. or. Croatian language.. Works on the language(s) of the Serbs, Croats, and Bosnians treated together as a single language are entered under. Serbo-Croatian language..
